event_description:
DANIELA SANCHEZ ART ADVISORY invites you to visit our new exhibition "Repúblicas" on the occasion of the Barcelona Gallery Weekend. Enjoy a delicious drink of La Hechicera rum with us at Lluis el Piadós 4, on Wednesday 28, 8PM. The gallery will remain open from 11am-8pm this week. For further information, please visit our website www.danielasanchezart.com

+info
